title: 02/28/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/28/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Kyler Murray situation. Is he handling business with the Cardinals wrong? With rumors circulating about broadcasters landing with different networks, DP explains how this is the new transfer portal. And ESPN MLB Insider Jeff Passan shares the latest on the MLB Lockout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
